name: dino-game-2.0
description: Enhanced multiplayer Dino racing game with WebSocket support

scripts.netlify-build: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); if(!fs.existsSync('dist')) fs.mkdirSync('dist'); ['index.html','lobby.html','game.html','styles.css','game.js','lobby.js','config.js'].forEach(f=>{if(fs.existsSync(f)) fs.copyFileSync(f,path.join('dist',f))});"

author: Your Name
